content: lion brand pattern # 50145 skill level easy level 2 big article #230 *discontinued* a solid 132 yards b print 70 yards size p-15 \ 10 mm crochet hook size q-19 \ **15 75 mm** crochet hook for strap one 1 \ 2 5 cm red button sewing needle and matching thread gauge 6 single_crochet = 4 \ 10 cm on smaller hook rnds 1-2 = 2 1/2 \ 6 5 cm in diameter bag is worked in rounds strap is chained with larger hook with 2 strands held together rest of bag is single strand sew button and strap to bag to finish
